contributionDescription:
I mostly analyze on Dune and on Twitter, such as writing interesting topics about optimism data. Building the Dune tool, analyzing things like optimism rankings

I wrote a total of 6 threads about the optimism ecosystem and retroPGF3 on Twitter:

1. Including 7 interesting information about OP Mainnet (Optimism)!!
2. You may be missing out on opportunities worth xx,xxx$ and the chance to contribute to creating good things for the optimism community.
3. Let's meet DefiLlama, the standout recipient of the RPGF2 award!
4. Keep an eye on this one, gitcoin
5. Introducing "Fire" - Your Best Buddy on Web3!
6. HopProtocol: Bridging Blockchains!

and made 3 Dune dashboards:

1. Optimism Users Ranking
2. Optimism Dashboard
3. Optimism Analysis

The total engagement is more than 30000 views.

contributionLinks.description: Including 7 interesting information about OP Mainnet (Optimism)!!
chance to contribute to creating good things for the optimism community.
Keep an eye on this one, gitcoin
Introducing "Fire" - Your Best Buddy on Web3!

impactDescription: Every work that I do I hope to spread and share knowledge about the optimism ecosystem to other people who are new to the web3 world. Or even many people who are better than me. and from the total engagement amount in the tens of thousands It made me quite satisfied with the response that exceeded my expectations. At least there should be people who get to know a little more optimism than before. It would be good. In addition to having more knowledge I also hope that those people will continue to spread good things.

fundingSources.description: I have never received any income from my contributions.(need to enter 1 to pass)

pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, User Experience & Adoption
